name: Unsettled (itch) (Brian Wo, Lila Ravelle)
description:
Created for GMTK Game Jam 2022

"Take deep breath."
"Hold on to yourself."
"Just believe yourself!"
"You can do it!"

You know what? I hate all those generic words. I've tried everything, knew every words people tell, yet I can't never, ever, get my past self back. Everything feels pointless, everything feels meaningless. I just want to get out but I don't know where to go...

Controls
Move left: A/H/Left Arrow
Move right: D/L/Right Arrow
Shuffle dice - Space bar
Lock die - click on the die

Credits

Art & design by Brian Wo (Twitter, GitHub, Instagram)
Sound and music by Lila Ravelle (Twitter, Instagram, YouTube)
Programming by Meidie Lo (GitHub, Instagram)
